task.title: Editing Board Status
task.shortdesc: When a project is complete, or an action is taken for the step, the status can be updated. This tells other users that the step is Complete, In Progress, Delayed, or can be given a custom status.

step.cmd: From the Boards page, locate the task that needs an updated status
Under the status column, click on the box in the necessary task row
A selection of status boxes will appear, selcect the appropriate one for the current task status
the task status has now been updated
